name: Element Samurai
description:
This is a prototype of my school's 3rd year solo project. From 09/2020 to 12/2021. The scope is one level, which will act as a vertical slice.

All graphic and audio assets in the current build are temporary. 

Pitch

In Element Samurai, you play a samurai purchassing an outlaw through the Yokai Mountain.  His blade can absorb the element of the last enemy it touched, allowing you to switch between different abilities.

  • Fire element : shoot fireball that burn wood and light torches
  • Wind element : gain an extra wind jump and projects an airstream
  • More to come in later versions !

Main inspirations for the project are Celeste (pixel art style, platforming), Kirby (stealing the enemies abilities, straightforward level design) and Genshin Impact (elements and environnement interactions).

There are 5 hidden Kitsune collectibles to find !

Controls (Keyboard / Gamepad)
  • Run : Keyboard arrows / Right stick
  • Jump / Wall jump : Spacebar / Bottom pad button
  • Contact attack : S / Right pad button
  • Element attack : D /  Left pad button
